Users

Load CSV

You can use CSV file to choose users. This is useful with Excel spreadsheets. This also allows for mapping email addresses between Exchange and Zimbra.

If you use mapping, the source name is mapped to the destination name.

Object Picker

This brings up the Exchange picker to find users.

LDAP Browser

This brings up the LDAP Browser to find users via LDAP queries.

Plus and Minus buttons

Use the plus button to add a new user to the user list manually. Use the minus button to remove a user.

Save

You can save your configuration to a .csv file

Next

Hitting Next brings you to the Schedule view.
